name: Amazing Team Member Carousel
author: Noor-E-Alam

sections.description:
Amazing Team Member Carousel is a super modern team member plugin. Unlimited Colors, 100% responsive, automatic resize images, flexible, unlimited items, shortcode powered, custom link and more

You can easily add team members & embed them in separate page post or widgets.

Features

  • Unlimited Colors.
  • 100% Responsive.
  • Super easy Installation.
  • Custom post enabled.
  • Amazing option panel.
  • Shortcode Powered.
  • Unlimited items.
  • Social Share Icons.
  • Control Carousel Number of Carousel Items.
  • Custom Link for Member.
  • All Major browser supported.

See Live Demo Here: http://demo.wpvalueclub.com/amazing-team-member-carousel/
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

After install, this plugin enable a custom post called Team Members. Add new items on that custom post.
After adding items, you are ready to use this plugin in your post, page, widget or anywhere you like.

Go to page > Add New. On the editor, you will see a button called Team Shortcode by clicking button you see the shortcode like [atmc]
